Data Behind the Scenes

A free, online-only, single-track conference centered on the real stories of data work from the folks in the trenches.

(Tentatively scheduled for Wednesday, 2025-09-24.)

We’re not here for the latest AI hype, perfect case studies, and sales pitches — we want the messy, honest experiences that happen when the demo ends and actual work begins. We want to share stories of what goes on with data behind the scenes.
